name: Fluffy
description: Fluffy is a very friendly dog. He loves to play with other dogs and go for long walks.

name: Whiskers
description: Whiskers is a very independent cat. She loves to play with toys and take long naps.

name: Buddy
description: Buddy is a very energetic dog. He loves to play fetch and go for runs.

name: Mittens
description: Mittens is a very playful cat. She loves to chase laser pointers and cuddle.
